keyInsights.insight: $1,597 spent on 190 zero-conversion search terms (95% of visible spend).
1 low-QS keywords costing ~$438/month in CPC premiums.
Only 32% Search Impression Share — missing 68% of eligible searches.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 7 conversion actions (1x PAGE_VIEW, 2x PURCHASE, 2x BOOK_APPOINTMENT, 1x CONTACT, 1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD). Recording 41 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 41 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 5 conversion categories: 1x PAGE_VIEW, 2x PURCHASE, 2x BOOK_APPOINTMENT, 1x CONTACT, 1x PHONE_CALL_LEAD.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: No obvious duplicate conversion actions detected.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 7 actions recording 41 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $1,597 spent on 190 zero-conversion search terms (95% of $1,690 visible search spend). Top waste: "things to do in jaco costa rica" $136, "canyoning costa rica" $66, "things to do in jaco" $53, "jaco waterfall tour" $32, "things to do near jaco costa rica" $31.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: No negative keyword lists. Create themed lists immediately to stop wasted spend on irrelevant queries.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: No negative lists to apply. Build and attach lists to all campaigns.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $1,809 spend, 29.3 conv, $62 CPA. Exact: $741 spend, 1 conv, $741 CPA.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 2 keywords spent $162 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "waterfall rappelling costa rica" $106, "adventure tours jaco costa rica" $56.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 1 naming prefix(es) across 1 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 1 ad groups across 1 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 1 campaigns: 1 SEARCH.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 1 campaigns, $130/day budget, 32% Search Impression Share. Top: CTM - exact match (1.54x ROAS, $3,687).

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $130/day budget, ~$123/day actual spend (95% utilization).

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 7.2/10 across 5 scored keywords (4 at 7+, 0 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$438/month. Top offenders: "things to do in jaco costa rica" QS 1 ($685 spend, ~$438 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 93 of 488 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 7.2 indicates good keyword-to-ad relevance.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 1 RSAs: 1 Good/Excellent, 0 need improvement (1 GOOD).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 8.26%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 32% Search Impression Share — missing 68% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 16 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 19 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 1 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 41 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 1 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 7 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: 1 Customer Match list(s) uploaded.

quickWins.action: Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "things to do in jaco costa rica", "canyoning costa rica", "things to do in jaco"... — $1,597 wasted.
Improve 1 keywords with QS below 5 — est. $438/month CPC premium. Worst: "things to do in jaco costa rica" QS 1.
Pause 2 zero-conversion keywords: "waterfall rappelling costa rica", "adventure tours jaco costa rica" — $162 wasted.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.
Fix: Negative keyword lists — No negative keyword lists. Create themed lists immediately to stop wasted spend on irrelevant queries.
Fix: Account-level negatives — No negative lists to apply. Build and attach lists to all campaigns.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

items: $1,597 wasted on 190 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "things to do in jaco costa rica", "canyoning costa rica", "things to do in jaco", "jaco waterfall tour", "things to do near jaco costa rica".
1 keywords with QS below 5 are costing ~$438 extra/month in CPC premiums. Improve ad relevance and landing page alignment for these keywords.
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Build 3+ themed negative keyword lists (Competitors, Job seekers, Irrelevant terms) and attach to all campaigns.
Pause or restructure 2 zero-conversion keywords to recover $162/month.
Increase Search Impression Share from 32% — you're missing 68% of potential customers.
With 41 conversions/month, test Demand Gen or Display remarketing for upper-funnel growth.
